It is a Van Car The specifications of the Car include engine displacement 1196 CC , fuel efficiency level 16.20 Kmpl , fuel tank capacity of 40 litres, maximum power of 63bhp@6000rpm , maximum torque of 83Nm@3000rpm and transmission is Manual. olxcars.description: Rolls-Royce Phantom is a 5 seater Luxury available in a price range f Rs. 8.99 - 10.48 Cr*. It is available in 2 variants, a 6749 cc, BS6 and a single Automatic transmission. Other key specifications of the Phantom include a kerb weight of 2745kg, ground clearance of 164mm and boot space of 460 Liters. The Phantom is available in 17 colours. indianews.title: Grain ATM dispensing ration soon to be a reality in Odisha
indianews.description: The Odisha government has drawn up plans to install grain ATMs which can dispense food items to beneficiaries of the Public Distribution System (PDS) scheme.

indianews.title: BJP had no time for disgruntled UP minister Jitin Prasada
indianews.description: BJP leader Jitin Prasada, who is reportedly miffed with the UP government, was in Delhi to meet party high command on Wednesday

indianews.title: Teesta Setalvad part of conspiracy to frame PM Modi in 2002 Gujarat riots case: Probe team to Court
indianews.description: A state SIT told a court that Teesta Setalvad was part of a larger conspiracy to frame the then-Gujarat Chief Minister Narendra Modi and others as accused in the post-Godhra riots case

indianews.title: Courts should make police accountable for arresting a person for frivolous reasons: Justice Madan Lokur
indianews.description: In an exclusive interview with India Today, former Supreme Court Judge Justice Madan Lokur said that courts should make police accountable for arresting a person for frivolous reasons.

indianews.title: Russian cargo ship, detained at Kerala port, released
indianews.description: A Russian cargo ship which was detained at a Kerala port was released on Wednesday.

indianews.title: SC grants bail to Mohammed Zubair: What will it take to rein in law enforcement agencies?
indianews.description: On a day when the Supreme Court granted Alt News co-founder Mohammad Zubair interim bail in all FIRs lodged in Uttar Pradesh against him for alleged hate speech, we raised these questions on the show:

indianews.title: Sonia Gandhi will be in ED office today, Congress on streets
indianews.description: The Enforcement Directorate (ED) will question Congress President Sonia Gandhi today over the National Herald case. Meanwhile, Congress workers are planning a nationwide protest against the ED summons to Sonia.

indianews.title: Some aspirants seeking new career path post Agnipath announcement
indianews.description: Military aspirants, who had cleared exams under the previous recruitment scheme, are apprehensive about Agnipath and are seeking new career opportunities.

indianews.title: Good news: Meet Neetu who gives free education to underprivileged kids in Bihar"s Saran district
indianews.description: In our good news segment, watch the story of Neetu who provides free education and even study materials to underprivileged kids in Bihar"s Saran district.

indianews.title: Fire onboard INS Vikramaditya, no casualties reported
indianews.description: During a planned sortie at sea, a fire broke out onboard INS Vikramaditya on Wednesday, July 20.

indianews.title: MP civic polls: Cong makes inroads into BJP stronghold with Gwalior, Jabalpur mayor seats
indianews.description: Gwalior and Jabalpur, both strongholds of the BJP, are set to have a Congress mayor after a gap of over 50 years and 23 years respectively.

indianews.title: Attorney General refuses to prosecute journalist for tweet against CJI Ramana
indianews.description: Attorney General KK Venugopal turned down a request to initiate proceedings for criminal contempt against journalist Dilip Mandal for his tweet against the Chief Justice of India (CJI) NV Ramana.

indianews.title: India"s third case of monkeypox confirmed in Kerala as 35-year-old UAE returnee tests positive
indianews.description: This is India’s third monkeypox case. The two earlier cases have also been reported from Kerala.

indianews.title: African Swine Fever reported in Kerala"s Wayanad
indianews.description: African swine fever is a highly contagious and fatal viral disease affecting domestic pigs.

indianews.title: Cross-voting in 10 states bolsters Droupadi Murmu’s win, exposes fault lines in Oppn
indianews.description: With Droupadi Murmu winning the presidential polls with an overwhelming majority, it has become clear that Opposition MPs and MLAs defied party lines to cross-vote for the NDA candidate.

indianews.title: Protestors write "Haj House" on walls of Congress office in Ahmedabad, defaces posters and banners
indianews.description: The activists defaced several pictures of Congress leaders at the Rajiv Gandhi Bhavan early morning on Friday.

indianews.title: In jolt to Mamata Banerjee, BJP says 2 TMC MPs, 1 MLA cross-voted in Murmu"s favour
indianews.description: In sobering news for Mamata Banerjee, the BJP has claimed that quite a few of her party MPs and MLAs cross-voted in Droupadi Murmu"s favour.

indianews.title: ED lands at Bengal minister Partha Chatterjee"s home, questions him in SSC scam probe
indianews.description: The Enforcement Directorate is questioning West Bengal minister and TMC leader Partha Chatterjee in connection with the SSC recruitment scam case.

indianews.title: Illegal liquor worth Rs 56 lakh destroyed in Gujarat’s Surat
indianews.description: Thousands of liquor bottles worth Rs 56 lakh were bulldozed in Gujarat"s Surat on Thursday.

indianews.title: Droupadi Murmu scripts history, becomes India’s 1st tribal president | Know her journey
indianews.description: Droupadi Murmu scripted history on Thursday when she was elected India"s first Adivasi President. Here’s what you need to know about her.
